sys_ux_client_script.name: Handle activityLogs update

sys_update_version.name: sys_ux_client_script_a0190e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb0d
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_ux_client_script"><sys_ux_client_script action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><includes/><macroponent display_value="Record">12094a091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb3a</macroponent><name>Handle activityLogs update</name><preset/><required_translations>[ ]</required_translations><script><![CDATA[
function handler({api, event: {payload: {name, value}}, helpers, imports}) {
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME = 'templatesRefresh';
    const TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS = ['inserted', 'closed', 'deleted', 'updated'];
    const templateRefreshState = api.state[TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME];

    if (name === 'activityLogs' && value && value.size > 0) {
        const mapEntries = Array.from(value);
        if (!mapEntries || mapEntries.length < 1)
            return;
        const curCrudActivities = mapEntries.pop()[1].activities.get('crud');
        if (!curCrudActivities || curCrudActivities.length < 1)
            return;
        const {table, operation, timestamp} = curCrudActivities[curCrudActivities.length - 1];

        if (table.match(/^sys_template\d*$/) && TEMPLATES_REFRESH_OPERATIONS.includes(operation) && timestamp !== templateRefreshState.timestamp) {
                api.setState(TEMPLATES_REFRESH_STATE_NAME, {
                    timestamp,
                });
        }
    }
}]]></script><script_api_version>2.0.0</script_api_version><sys_class_name>sys_ux_client_script</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>TBlev1</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-07 17:20:42</sys_created_on><sys_customer_update>false</sys_customer_update><sys_id>a0190e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb0d</sys_id><sys_mod_count>0</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Handle activityLogs update</sys_name><sys_package display_value="Insight Process Management" source="x_snc_insight_pr_0">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_replace_on_upgrade>false</sys_replace_on_upgrade><sys_scope display_value="Insight Process Management">39bd5e9747f05510ab51f109536d431c</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_ux_client_script_a0190e091bac71500f0eda43cc4bcb0d</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>TBlev1</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-08-07 17:20:42</sys_updated_on><target>macroponent</target><type>default</type></sys_ux_client_script></record_update>
